Badge, the symbol of his status as a boss...\c
He gave it to you, did he?[VAR 0114(0009)]

team_0030_cassiopeia_04a:
With its boss out of the picture, the Segin Squad
is pretty much done for.[VAR 0114(0009)]
team_0030_cassiopeia_04b:
Now that its boss has been taken down, the Navi
Squad’s days are numbered.[VAR 0114(0009)]
team_0030_cassiopeia_04c:
With its boss no longer around, the Ruchbah
Squad is as good as finished.[VAR 0114(0009)]
team_0030_cassiopeia_04d:
Now that there’s no boss to lead them, the rest
of the Schedar Squad shouldn’t last long.[VAR 0114(0009)]
team_0030_cassiopeia_04e:
Without its boss, the Caph Squad should be a
hair’s breadth from disbanding.[VAR 0114(0009)]
team_0030_cassiopeia_06: Sorry. Got caught up in my thoughts for a second.[VAR 0114(0009)]
team_0030_cassiopeia_08:
Now, about your reward. I’ll transfer some LP
over to your phone, as promised.[VAR 0114(0009)]
team_0030_system_03:
You can now make more kinds of TMs using the
TM Machine!
team_0030_cassiopeia_09:
I took the liberty of adding some new entries to
the range of TMs you can make at TM Machines.[VAR 0114(0009)]
team_0030_cassiopeia_10:
These new TMs should help you improve your
Pokémon’s battle capabilities even further.[VAR 0114(0009)]
team_0030_cassiopeia_07:
In any case...you did some solid work out there.
So much so that you deserve an extra reward.\c
Someone from my supply unit will be there soon
to give you some materials for making TMs.[VAR 0114(0009)]
team_0030_botan_03:
You probably don’t remember, but you got me
out of a tight spot by the school stairs...[VAR 0114(0008)]
team_0030_botan_04b:
That figures. I never leave an impression
on people...[VAR 0114(0008)]
team_0030_botan_05:
But, um. I’m helping out with Operation Starfall
as part of my independent study... You know,\r
the Treasure Hunt.\c
I’m good with machines and hacking and stuff,
so I’ll be working behind the scenes.[VAR 0114(0008)]
team_0030_botan_06:
So...here you go. Your bonus reward from
Cassiopeia.[VAR 0114(0008)]
team_0030_system_04: You received lots of Pokémon [VAR COLOR(0008)]materials[VAR COLOR(0000)]!
team_0030_botan_07:
You should be able to make a ton of TMs
with those.[VAR 0114(0008)]
team_0030_botan_08:
And Cassiopeia said you’ll get more rewards
each time you take out one of Team Star’s bases.[VAR 0114(0008)]
team_0030_botan_10:
Also, um...I heard all about how you had your
Pokémon charge into battle.\c
Seems you were pretty amazing.[VAR 0114(0008)]
team_0030_botan_11:
With a Trainer as strong as you on our side,
I’m sure the operation will go just fine.[VAR 0114(0008)]
team_0030_botan_09:
There’s four more squad bosses left, so, um...
good luck...[VAR 0114(0008)]
